mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NO memberNo, SUBSTR(MEMBER.EMAIL, 0, 2) || RPAD('*', INSTR(MEMBER.EMAIL, '@') - 3, '*') || SUBSTR(MEMBER.EMAIL, INSTR(MEMBER.EMAIL, '@')) email, MEMBER.NICKNAME nickname, SUBSTR(MEMBER.PHONE, 1, INSTR(MEMBER.PHONE, '-')) || RPAD('*', INSTR(MEMBER.PHONE, '-', 1, 2) - INSTR(MEMBER.PHONE, '-') - 1, '*') || SUBSTR(MEMBER.PHONE, INSTR(MEMBER.PHONE, '-', 1, 2)) phone, MEMBER.INTRODUCE introduce, MEMBER.CREATE_DATE createDate, MEMBER.UPDATE_DATE updateDate, MEMBER.DELETE_DATE deleteDate, MEMBER.STATUS status, MEMBER.ROLE role, COUNT(REVIEW.REVIEW_NO) reviewCount, (SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM FR_MEMBER_IMAGE WHERE MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO ) profileImage FROM FR_MEMBER MEMBER LEFT JOIN FR_REVIEW REVIEW ON MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = REVIEW.MEMBER_NO GROUP BY MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.EMAIL, MEMBER.NICKNAME, MEMBER.PHONE, MEMBER.INTRODUCE, MEMBER.CREATE_DATE, MEMBER.UPDATE_DATE, MEMBER.DELETE_DATE, MEMBER.STATUS, MEMBER.ROLE ORDER BY MEMBER.MEMBER_NO ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FR_MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{nickname} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT R.RESTAURANT_NO restaurantNo , R.BUSINESS_NO businessNo , M.NICKNAME nickname , M.EMAIL memberId , M.ROLE role , R.RESTAURANT_NAME restaurantName , R.ADDRESS address , R.STATUS status , R.CREATE_DATE createDate , R.UPDATE_DATE updateDate , R.DELETE_DATE deleteDate , (SELECT CHANGE_NAME FROM FR_MEMBER_IMAGE MI WHERE MI.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ) profileImage FROM FR_RESTAURANT R JOIN FR_MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE ROLE = 'ROLE_USER' ORDER BY R.RESTAURANT_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
